item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

6. AWS will discontinue support for AWS App Mesh (18 points | discuss)

25. YC X25, the spring 2025 batch (43 points | 30 comments)
26. Bioinspired weather-responsive adaptive shading (31 points | 3 comments)

29. Slugs on a Cube: An Interactive Animation (42 points | 5 comments)
